confirmVerificationHeading: Confirm you have verified this person's identity
confirmVerificationWarningText: We could suspend or stop {ACSP_NAME} from acting as an authorised agent if you have not met Companies House identity verification standard.
confirmationStatement: I confirm that {ACSP_NAME} verified the identity of {PERSON_NAME} to the standard set by Companies House and is satisfied that the required personal information is true. The verification checks were completed on {VERIFICATION_DATE}.
informationShownOnPublicRegister: What information we'll show on the public register
showThisDeclaration: We will show this declaration as part of any records about the person on the online Companies House register.
error-declarationNotChecked: Select to confirm you have verified their identity
